Description.$t: Chloe's always had a crush on skater boy Doug. With only one day before Prom, can she get past her shyness, and ask out her dream guy?

GoalDescription.words: Chloe's always wanted to date Doug. Help her prom dreams come true.
Chloe doesn't even remember how she and Buzz became enemies in the first place. Maybe it's time to bury the hatchet.

taskNaturalLanguage.words: Make Chloe ###CHLOE### and Buzz ###BUZZ### not enemies ###NOT ENEMIES###

Description.$t: Learn how to help Chloe ask Doug out.
Make Chloe's prom night dreams come true!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hi Edward. How's your prom night going?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Pretty miserable. Just the way I like it. Yours?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I don't know. I'm worried I'm like a hopeless failure or something.
I mean it feels like even if something is set up perfectly for me, so there's no way I can fail, I still find a way to fail.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Maybe you should worry less about arbitrary goals you think some magical sky person has for you, and more about just exploring and having a good time.
'All the world's a stage, and we poor creatures merely players!'
Edgar Allan Poe.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I think that was Shakespeare.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well, agree to disagree.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh man, Doug, this is so totally wild. I never thought I'd have such an awesome date to the prom. Thanks for humoring me.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Are you kidding me? I've had a crush on you since sixth grade.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %shocked%... seriously? Like for reals?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: For totes reals, %buddy%.

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: Hey losers, what's up? Are you two going for the dorkiest couple award or something?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Whatever man. Can't you be like mature or whatever? Just leave us alone.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Sweetie, let me handle this.
Listen, %pejorative%. If you ever talk to my boyfriend that way again, I'll get a law degree and sue you for harrassment faster than you can say 'minimum wage.' Got it?

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: Uhhhhhh.... I'm gonna go over here now.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Wow! You're amazing, %sweetie%. I never thought I'd see anyone stand up to that %pejorative% like that.
And, uh... did you say 'boyfriend?'

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I totally did, %sweetie%. I totally did.

Ending.name: Perfect Night
Ending.$c: Date Doug and Time for Peace

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: It's so good to be spending prom night with you, %sweetie%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Totally, %sweetie%. Uh oh, here comes Buzz...

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: Hey guys. Uh, look. Uh... I know I was kind of a jerk for most of the year.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Most of high school, actually.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: And junior high.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Not to mention elementary school.

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: OK well look, the point is, I'm, uhhhhhh....

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Awkward.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Totally.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: It's OK, Buzz. We know what you mean.

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: Thanks. Hey, have you guys seen my girlfriend anywhere?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I think that's her making out with that guy over by the punchbowl.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Sometimes I worry about Buzz, Doug.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Baby, I'm not worried about anything.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Buzz, I just wanted to let you know how glad I am that we finally buried the hatchet.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Uhh, yeah! I don't even remember why we started fighting in the first place
That might just be because of my concussions though
Sometimes when you're defending the red zone, you've gotta use your head, if you know what I mean.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Ah, yeah.  Oh, look, here comes Doug.

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: Hola, amigos. S'up? Hey Chloe, wanna dance?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well Doug... this might be a little sudden, but I've actually had a crush on you for years.
Not so fast, buster. I've HAD a crush on you. I've even dared to dream that you might like me back. But we totally and utterly failed to kindle a meaningful relationship this week.
The most romantic of *all* weeks.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: If you can't get a date during prom week, you're not just a crapface, you're a crap... uh... crap...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I think what Buzz is trying to say, is that I've decided... I've decided to drop the candle I've been holding for you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Holding candles burns both your heart *and* your hands.

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: Bummer.  That sucks, dude. Okay, well, I'm gonna go see what Edward is doing.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: So, uhhh, do you wanna make out?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hmm. Maybe later. I'm still feeling a little waxy...
If you know what I mean.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I totally don't! But it sounds pretty hot.
